ActCanadian Human Rights Act
Accessible Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL GOTTHEIL of Edmonton, Alberta, to be the Accessibility Commissioner of the Canadian Human Rights Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective May 9, 2022.
